pages.text: A sub-class of $(l:aoa3:guns#guns)guns$(/l), $(thing)Shotguns$() work in a similar manner.$(br)The defining difference with $(thing)shotguns$() however, is that they fire larger rounds, hitting all targets in an small area simultaneously, or the same target multiple times.
pages.title: Shotguns

pages.text: $(thing)Shotguns$() fire much slower than regular $(thing)guns$(), but exchange that fire rate for higher damage output per shot, and the ability to hit multiple targets at once.$(br)Be aware that $(thing)shotguns$() only have a fairly short range because the pellets become ineffective, so these weapons must be used at short range.
Replace the fast firing single shot $(l:aoa3:guns#guns)guns$(/l) with heavy-duty $(thing)shotgun$() blasts.
pages.title: A Shotgun

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)shotguns$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
